alert.note: Alert for Wichita (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 04 at 1:34PM CDT until November 04 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Comanche County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northwestern Cotton County in southwestern Oklahoma... Southeastern Tillman County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northwestern Wichita County in northern Texas... * Until 215 PM CDT. * At 134 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Electra, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Electra, Geronimo, Grandfield, Chattanooga, Faxon, Loveland and Haynesville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
